decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The proposed development, by reason of its poor architectural design, particularly the height of the proposed building would fail to respect the external appearance and design of the existing dwelling and would fail to respect the prevailing character in the streetscene. The development would therefore fail to meet the high quality design aspirations of the National Planning Policy Framework (2021), Policy D3 (D(1) and D(11)) of The London Plan (2021), policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document Residential Design Guide (2010), and would therefore not be within the tolerances of Condition A.A.2(3)(a)(ii) of Class AA of Part 1, Schedule 2 of the General Permitted Development Order (2015) as amended.

Reason : 2 - The proposed development will include windows in the side elevation of the dwellinghouse and would therefore be the contrary to condition of A.A.2(b) of Class AA of Part 1, Schedule 2 of the General Permitted Development Order (2015) as amended.
description: Additional two Storeys (height 5.3 m)  to a dwellinghouse - maximum overall height 13.9 m (Prior approval of impact on the amenity of any adjoining premises; the external appearance of the dwellinghouse; air traffic and defence asset impacts and impact on a protected view)
